Name: Add-CertificateEnrollmentPolicyServer
Synopsis: Adds an enrollment policy server to the current user or local system configuration.

Name: Export-Certificate
Synopsis: Exports a certificate from a certificate store into a file.

Name: Export-PfxCertificate
Synopsis: Exports a certificate or a PFXData object to a Personal Information Exchange (PFX) file.

Name: Get-Certificate
Synopsis: Submits a certificate request to an enrollment server and installs the response or retrieves a certificate for a previously submitted request.

Name: Get-CertificateEnrollmentPolicyServer
Synopsis: Returns all of the certificate enrollment policy server URL configurations.

Name: Get-CertificateNotificationTask
Synopsis: Returns all registered certificate notification tasks.

Name: Get-PfxData
Synopsis: Extracts the content of a Personal Information Exchange (PFX) file into a structure without importing it to certificate store.

Name: Import-Certificate
Synopsis: Imports one or more certificates into a certificate store.

Name: Import-PfxCertificate
Synopsis: Imports certificates and private keys from a Personal Information Exchange (PFX) file to the destination store.

Name: New-CertificateNotificationTask
Synopsis: Creates a new task in the Task Scheduler that will be triggered when a certificate is replaced, expired, or about to expired.

Name: New-SelfSignedCertificate
Synopsis: Creates a new self-signed certificate for testing purposes.

Name: Remove-CertificateEnrollmentPolicyServer
Synopsis: Removes an enrollment policy server and the URL of the enrollment policy server from the current user or local computer configuration.

Name: Remove-CertificateNotificationTask
Synopsis: Removes a certificate notification task from Task Scheduler.

Name: Switch-Certificate
Synopsis: Marks one certificate as having been replaced by another certificate.

Name: Test-Certificate
Synopsis: Verifies a certificate according to the input parameters.
